Select * From A left JOIN B ON A.name = B.name left JOIN C ON A.name = C.name
select 과목.이름, 과목.교수번호, 교수.이름, 교수.학과번호 from 과목, 교수 where 과목.교수번호 = 교수.번호
SELECT A.SINGO_NO, A.SINGO_CATEGORY_NO, A.SINGO_LINK, A.SINGO_USER_REASON, A.SINGO_CREATE_DATE, A.SINGO_REMOVE_DATE, A.SINGO_REASON, A.FREE_NO, A.USER_NO FROM (SELECT S.SINGO_NO, S.SINGO_CATEGORY_NO, S.SINGO_LINK, S.SINGO_USER_REASON, S.SINGO_CREATE_DATE, S.SINGO_REMOVE_DATE, S.SINGO_REASON, F.FREE_NO,F.TITLE U.ID FROM SINGO S LEFT JOIN FREE F ON S.FREE_NO = F.FREE_NO LEFT JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) A ORDER BY SINGO_NO ASC
INSERT INTO SINGO (SINGO_CATEGORY, SINGO_TITLE, SINGO_LINK, SINGO_USER_REASON, SINGO_CREATE_DATE, SINGO_REMOVE_DATE, SINGO_REASON, ID, IP) VALUES (#{singoCategory},#{singoTitle}, #{singoLink}, #{singoUserReason}, #{createDate}, NULL, #{singoReason}, #{userId}, #{ip})
SELECT SINGO_CATEGORY_NO, SINGO_CATEGORY_NAME FROM SINGO_CATEGORY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SINGO_CATEGORY
INSERT INTO SINGO_CATEGORY (SINGO_CATEGORY_NAME) VALUES (#{singoCategoryName})
DELETE FROM SINGO_CATEGORY WHERE SINGO_CATEGORY_NO = #{singoCategoryNo}
